        public void deleteCompany(java.lang.Integer id)
        Deletes Company from database.
        Specified by:
        deleteCompany in interface CompanyDao
        Parameters:
        id - Company.id of Company to be deleted.
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException - if company to be deleted has one or more Employees AND Company.employees field is not annotated with @OnDelete(action=OnDeleteAction.CASCADE).
